member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.LogLevel
member.summary: Current log level. Log information with lower level will not be recorded.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Enabled
member.summary: Set or get whether log enabled.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Initialize(System.String)
member.summary: Initialize a single file log instance. Thread safe not supported.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Initialize(SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogConfig)
member.summary: Initialize a log instance by specified configuration.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Print(System.String,SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogLevel,System.Object[])
member.summary: Recored message. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than the specified log level.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Print(System.Exception,System.String,SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogLevel,System.Object[])
member.summary: Recored message. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than the specified log level.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Trace(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Recored message as 'Trace' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Trace'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Debug(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Record message as 'Debug' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Debug'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Info(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Record message as 'Info' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Info'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Warn(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Record message as 'Warn' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Warn'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Warn(System.Exception,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Record message and exception as 'Warn' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Warn'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Error(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Record message as 'Error' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Error'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Error(System.Exception,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Record message and exception as 'Error' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Error'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Fatal(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Record message as 'Fatal' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Fatal'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Fatal(System.Exception,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Record message and exception as 'Debug' level. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than 'Fatal'.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.StackTrace(System.String,SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogLevel)
member.summary: Record current stack trace to log. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than the specified log level in parameter.
member.param: The log level of current operation

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.ThreadInfo(SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogLevel)
member.summary: Record current thread information to log file. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than the specified log level in parameter
member.param: The log level of current operation

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.HostInfo(SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogLevel)
member.summary: Record Host info to log file. Message will not be recored when property LogLevel is higher than the specified log level in parameter
member.param: The log level of current operation

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.Logger.Close
member.summary: Close the current log instance. Thread safe not supported.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogConfig.FileLog
member.summary: The instance of file log configuration.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogConfig.LogFormat
member.summary: Log format.{0} for log level; {1} for time stamp; {2} for message

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogConfig.ExceptionFormat
member.summary: Exception information format.{0} for log level; {1} for time stamp; {2} for exception type {3} for exception message

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogConfig.StackTraceFormat
member.summary: Stack trace information format. {0} for message.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.LogConfig.ThreadInfoFormat
member.summary: Thread information format. {0} for thread id; {1} for thread name

member.summary: Create a new instance of log configuration class.

member.summary: The path of log file or log directory.

member.summary: The log file name format when LogMode is 'Directory'.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.Report.FileLogConfig.MaxLogSize
member.summary: The maximum size of single log file.
